definitions: 量[りょう] (n, n-suf) quantity, amount, volume, portion (of food)
捗[はか] (n) progress
english: So all this energy's gathered here for the Planet to heal itself?
japanese: ここのスゲエ[量]のエネルギーは星の傷を治すために集まってるわけか

definitions: 腫れる[はれる] (v1, vi) to swell (from inflammation), to become swollen
晴れる[はれる] (v1, vi) to clear up, to clear away, to be sunny, to stop raining,to refresh (e.g. spirits),to be cleared (e.g. of a suspicion),to be dispelled, to be banished
english: I'll gather everybody, so you go on ahead.
japanese: みんなを呼びに行きますよって先に行っとくんな[はれ]

definitions: 竜巻[たつまき] (n, adj-no) tornado, waterspout
english: Whirlwind Maze
japanese: [竜巻]の迷宮

definitions: 迷宮[めいきゅう] (n) labyrinth, maze,mystery
english: Whirlwind Maze
japanese: 竜巻の[迷宮]

definitions: 改[かい] (n-suf) revision
english: Received "Neo Bahamut" Materia!
japanese: 『バハムート[改]』のマテリアを手にいれた！

definitions: 捜し求める[さがしもとめる] (v1, vt) to search for, to seek for, to look for
english: This is the Promised Land the President had been searching for!!
japanese: まさにプレジデントが[さがしもとめ]た約束の地！！

definitions: 終着[しゅうちゃく] (n) arriving at the final stop (of a bus, train, etc.), reaching the end of the line
english: It's where the Reunion will take place… They will all gather here…
japanese: ……リユニオンの[終着]点。……みんな集まれ、か

definitions: 気流[きりゅう] (n) atmospheric current, air current, airflow
english: We need to cross when the wind is calm, or we'll get swept off!
japanese: [気流]がおさまるタイミングを見て渡らないとはじき飛ばされちゃうわ！

definitions: はじき飛ばす[はじきとばす] (v5s, vt) to flick off, to give ... the flick, to send something flying, to hit (a person), to knock down
english: We need to cross when the wind is calm, or we'll get swept off!
japanese: 気流がおさまるタイミングを見て渡らないと[はじき飛ばさ]れちゃうわ！

definitions: 露[ロ] (n) Russia
兎馬[うさぎうま] (n) donkey
櫓[ろ] (n) Japanese scull (oar attached to the rear of the boat by a traditional peg-in-hole oarlock)
ロ (n) 2nd in a sequence denoted by the iroha system, 2nd note in the diatonic scale (used in key names, etc.)
炉[ろ] (n) hearth, fireplace,furnace, kiln
絽[ろ] (n, adj-no) silk gauze (esp. used in light clothing for high summer)
ろ (n) six
english: Uph…Se…phi…roth…
japanese: …グ……フ……ッ……セフィ…[ロ]…ス…

definitions: 細胞[さいぼう] (n, adj-no) cell
english: Jenova's cells…
japanese: ジェノバ[細胞]……

definitions: 殺気[さっき] (n) thirst for blood, bloodlust, determination to kill
english: I feel something…danger?
japanese: [殺気]？　何か感じるよ……

definitions: 消える[きえる] (v1, vi) to go out, to vanish, to disappear
english: Vanished? That can't be!
japanese: き、[きえ]てしまうなんて…そんなアホな！

definitions: 阿呆[あほ] (n, adj-na) fool, idiot, simpleton
english: Vanished? That can't be!
japanese: き、きえてしまうなんて…そんな[アホ]な！

definitions: 肉体[にくたい] (n, adj-no) the body, the flesh
english: What I wanted was a body. A seeing, hearing, moving body. Soon it will be…over.
japanese: ……欲しかったのは身体見、聞き、話し、移動する[肉体]。まもなく……終わる

definitions: 独活[うど] (n) udo (plant related to ginseng, used in medicine and cooking) (Aralia cordata)
english: BARRET
japanese: クラ[ウド]

definitions: 真っ暗[まっくら] (adj-na, n) total darkness, pitch dark,bleak future, poor prospects
english: Something's weird here! It got pitch black all of a sudden, and everyone disappeared!
japanese: なんか様子が変なんだよ！[真っ暗]になっちまってみんないなくなっちまった！

definitions: 奥底[おくそこ] (n) depths, bottom (of one's heart)
english: But it's releasing a powerfully strong will from deep within the Planet's wound.
japanese: しかし、とほうもなく強い意志をこの星の傷の[奥底]から放っている

definitions: 待機[たいき] (n, vs) standing by, awaiting an opportunity, being on alert
english: We're going in first! You guys stay and keep watch.
japanese: オレたちは先に行く！みんなは[待機]していてくれ

definitions: 重大[じゅうだい] (adj-na, n) serious, important, significant, grave, weighty
english: Damn! The pressure's on now.
japanese: おっと！　責任[重大]だぜ

definitions: 謎[なぞ] (adj-no) riddle, puzzle, enigma, mystery,enigmatic, mysterious
english: Yeah, sorry I made you worry. I solved the mystery.
japanese: ああ、心配かけたな。[謎]は解けた

definitions: 解ける[とける] (v1, vi) to be solved,to loosen, to come untied,to be removed (e.g. restrictions), to be cleared (e.g. misunderstandings), to be broken (e.g. spells, curses),to melt
解ける[ほどける] (v1, vi) to come lose, to come untied, to come undone, to unravel,to loosen up (e.g. tension)
english: Yeah, sorry I made you worry. I solved the mystery.
japanese: ああ、心配かけたな。謎は[解け]た

definitions: 幻覚[げんかく] (n) hallucination, illusion
english: Why, is it an illusion?
japanese: ……なぜだ……[幻覚]か？

definitions: 抜け出す[ぬけだす] (v5s, vi) to slip out, to sneak away, to break free, to get through (a difficult situation),to break into the lead, to get ahead,to begin to fall out (e.g. hair),to break out (of a loop)
english: Is this illusion going to continue forever? How do we get out of it?
japanese: この幻はず～っと続くの？どうやって[抜け出す]の？

definitions: 幻想[げんそう] (n) fantasy, illusion, vision, dream
english: We were in an illusion…
japanese: あ、[幻想]の中だった……

definitions: 生々しい[なまなましい] (adj-i) lively, green, fresh, raw, vivid, graphic
english: Oh, a dream! But it felt so real…
japanese: あ、マボロシかぁ！でも、ちょっと[生々しい]なぁ

definitions: 通う[かよう] (v5u, vi) to go to and from (a place), to go back and forth between, to run between (e.g. bus, train, etc.), to ply between,to go to (school, work, etc.), to attend, to commute, to frequent,to circulate (e.g. blood, electricity), to be communicated (e.g. thought),to resemble
火曜[かよう] (n-adv, n) Tuesday
歌謡[かよう] (n) song, ballad
可用[かよう] (n) available, in service
佳容[かよう] (n) comely face
可溶[かよう] (adj-na, n) soluble, solubilizing, solubilising
加養[かよう] (n, vs) caring for the sick, taking care of oneself
荷葉[かよう] (n) lotus leaf
斯様[かよう] (adj-na, n) in such a manner, like this
花葉[かよう] (n) floral leaf
家用[かよう] (n, adj-no) domestic uses
下葉[かよう] (n) lower lobe (of lung), inferior lobe
english: He…hey you! You alright!?
japanese: お、おい、おまえ！だいじょうぶ[かよっ]！

definitions: 作り出す[つくりだす] (v5s, vt) to manufacture, to produce, to raise (crops),to invent, to dream up, to create
english: What I have shown you is reality. What you remember, that is the illusion.
japanese: 私が見せた世界が真実の過去。幻想を[つくりだし]たのは……おまえだ

definitions: 作[さく] (n) work (e.g. of art), production,harvest, cultivation, farming, crop, yield,technique
english: Who would have ever thought a failed experiment would prove so useful?
japanese: それにしても失敗[作]だと思われたおまえが一番役に立つとは……

definitions: 悔しい[くやしい] (adj-i) vexing, annoying, frustrating, regrettable, mortifying
english: Hojo would die if he knew.
japanese: 宝条が知ったら[悔し]がるだろうな

definitions: ナンバリング (n) numbering,numbering machine
english: An incomplete Sephiroth-clone. Not even given a number. …That is your reality.
japanese: セフィロス・コピー・インコンプリート。[ナンバリング]無し。それがおまえの真実

definitions: 無し[なし] (n) without,unacceptable, not alright, unsatisfactory
english: An incomplete Sephiroth-clone. Not even given a number. …That is your reality.
japanese: セフィロス・コピー・インコンプリート。ナンバリング[無し]。それがおまえの真実

definitions: 裏腹[うらはら] (adj-na, n) opposite, reverse, contrary
english: Why are you so worried and scared by those words?
japanese: その言葉とは[うらはら]におまえは何をおびえている？

definitions: あやふや (adj-na, n) uncertain, vague, ambiguous
english: There's a lot of things muddled up in my memories.
japanese: 記憶だって[あやふや]な部分がたくさんあるんだ

definitions: 支える[ささえる] (v1, vt) to support, to prop, to sustain, to underlay, to hold up, to defend,to hold at bay, to stem, to check
english: Those words will always support me.
japanese: TIFAのその言葉がいつでも俺を[ささえ]てくれる

definitions: 言動[げんどう] (n) speech and conduct, words and deeds
english: The ability to change one's looks, voice, and words, is the power of Jenova.
japanese: 他人の記憶にあわせて自分の姿、声、[言動]を変化させるのはジェノバの能力だ

definitions: 写る[うつる] (v5r, vi) to be photographed, to be projected
english: I…should be in the picture.
japanese: 俺は……[写っ]ているはずだ

definitions: 箪笥[たんす] (n) chest of drawers, bureau, cabinet, tansu, dresser
english: I looked in the drawers!
japanese: [タンス]をしらべた！

definitions: 調べる[しらべる] (v1, vt) to examine, to look up, to investigate, to check up, to sense, to study, to inquire, to search
english: I looked in the drawers!
japanese: タンスを[しらべ]た！

definitions: これぞ (exp) this (emphatic)
english: The outside is rich with Mako energy. The inside is a treasure trove of Materia. This truly is the Promised Land.
japanese: 外は豊富な魔晄。そして中心部はマテリアの宝庫。[これぞ]まさに約束の地だな

definitions: 馬鹿馬鹿しい[ばかばかしい] (adj-i) absurd, ridiculous, silly, ludicrous, nonsensical, asinine, foolish
english: There is no such thing as the Promised Land. It's a legend…an old wives tale… …It's utterly ridiculous.
japanese: 約束の地など存在しない。伝説……言い伝え……[ばかばかしい]

definitions: 二流[にりゅう] (n, adj-no) second-rate, inferior
english: It is that kind of dullness that makes you a second-rate scientist.
japanese: そのカタさが[二流]科学者の限界だな

definitions: レポート (n, vs) report, paper
english: That's what was stated in Professor Gast's report.
japanese: ガスト博士の[レポート]にはそう記されていたな

definitions: 記す[しるす] (v5s) to write down, to note, to jot down,to remember
english: That's what was stated in Professor Gast's report.
japanese: ガスト博士のレポートにはそう[記さ]れていたな

definitions: 隠し事[かくしごと] (n) secret
english: You keep a lot of things to yourself.
japanese: 君は[隠し事]が多いな

definitions: 負える[おえる] (v1) to be able to bear,to be able to manage
english: This place is going to get rough.
japanese: ここはあんたたちの手には[負え]ない

definitions: プレッシャー (n) pressure
english: Okay then, here. Had a lot of pressure holding this thing.
japanese: じゃあ、これ。すげえ[プレッシャー]だったぜ

definitions: パーフェクト (n) perfect, perfection,perfect game
english: It means that my experiment was a complete success.
japanese: 私の実験が[パーフェクト]に成功したわけだな

definitions: たどり着く[たどりつく] (v5k, vi) to arrive at (after a struggle), to finally reach, to find one's way to, to finally hit on (e.g. an idea)
english: What the--? You mean only a failure made it here?
japanese: なんということだ……失敗作だけがここまで[たどりつい]たというのか……

definitions: 個体[こたい] (n, adj-no) individual, specimen
english: I never dreamed what I thought was a success…was actually a failure, and that which I considered a failure was my greatest success…
japanese: 私が成功とみなした[個体]が失敗……失敗と判定したおまえが最も優れていたとは……

definitions: 判定[はんてい] (n, vs) judgement, judgment, decision, adjudication, award, verdict, determination
english: I never dreamed what I thought was a success…was actually a failure, and that which I considered a failure was my greatest success…
japanese: 私が成功とみなした個体が失敗……失敗と[判定]したおまえが最も優れていたとは……

definitions: 優れる[すぐれる] (v1, vi) to surpass, to outstrip, to excel
english: I never dreamed what I thought was a success…was actually a failure, and that which I considered a failure was my greatest success…
japanese: 私が成功とみなした個体が失敗……失敗と判定したおまえが最も[優れ]ていたとは……

definitions: 後[のち] (n, adj-no) later, afterwards, since,future,after one's death,descendant
english: This is perfect! Both Jenova's Reunion and Sephiroth's  will!
japanese: 素晴らしい！ジェノバのリユニオンとセフィロスの意志[のち]から！

definitions: 拡散[かくさん] (n, vs, adj-no) scattering, diffusion, spread (e.g. signal across the spectrum)
english: They won't be diffused into the Lifestream, but gathered here!
japanese: ライフストリームに[拡散]することなくここに結集したのだ！

definitions: 結集[けっしゅう] (n, vs) concentration (of efforts, forces, etc.), gathering together, regimentation, marshalling, mobilization
english: They won't be diffused into the Lifestream, but gathered here!
japanese: ライフストリームに拡散することなくここに[結集]したのだ！

definitions: 直後[ちょくご] (n-adv, n-t) immediately following
english: …He's a Sephiroth-clone I created after the real Sephiroth died five years ago.
japanese: ……５年前、セフィロスが死んだ[直後]に私が創ったセフィロス・コピーのひとつ

definitions: 閃く[ひらめく] (v5k, vi) to flash (e.g. lightning), to flicker, to glitter, to sparkle, to gleam,to flutter (e.g. flag), to wave, to undulate,to flash into one's mind (e.g. an idea), to come to one suddenly
english: Jenova cells and Mako, with my knowledge and skills, have been combined with science and nature to bring him to life.
japanese: ジェノバ細胞と魔晄、それにくわえて私の知識、技術、[ひらめき]が生み出した科学と神秘の生命、セフィロス・コピー

definitions: 証明[しょうめい] (n, vs, adj-no) proof, verification, certification
english: …I'm not wild about the failure part, but the Jenova Reunion Theory has now been proven.
japanese: ……失敗作だというのが気に入らないがジェノバのリユニオン仮説は[証明]された

definitions: バラバラ (adj-na, adj-no, adv, vs) scattered, disperse, loose, disconnected, in pieces, in drops, rustling
english: You see, even if Jenova's body is dismembered, it will eventually become one again. That's what is meant by Jenova's Reunion.
japanese: ジェノバは身体を[バラバラ]にされてもやがてひとつの場所に集結し再生する。これがジェノバの『リユニオン』だ

definitions: 集結[しゅうけつ] (n, vs) massing (of troops), gathering
english: You see, even if Jenova's body is dismembered, it will eventually become one again. That's what is meant by Jenova's Reunion.
japanese: ジェノバは身体をバラバラにされてもやがてひとつの場所に[集結]し再生する。これがジェノバの『リユニオン』だ

definitions: 動き出す[うごきだす] (v5s) to come alive, to get going, to start to move
english: I have been waiting for the Reunion to start. Five years have passed, and now the clones have begun to return.
japanese: リユニオンの始まりを私は待った。５年がすぎ……コピーたちは[動き出し]た

definitions: 天才[てんさい] (n) genius, prodigy, natural gift
english: But being the genius that I am, I soon figured it out. You see it was all Sephiroth's doing.
japanese: ……私は[天才]だ、すぐにわかった。セフィロスの仕業だ

definitions: 操る[あやつる] (v5r, vt) to operate (e.g. a machine), to handle, to manage, to control, to maneuver, to steer,to have a good command of (a language), to play proficiently (of a musical instrument),to work (a puppet), to pull the strings of a puppet,to manipulate (a person, public opinion, etc.), to pull the strings, to control from the shadows, to mastermind
english: Sephiroth is not just content to diffuse his will into the Lifestream. He wants to manipulate the Clones himself.
japanese: セフィロスの意志はライフストリームで拡散することなく、セフィロス自身としてコピーを[あやつり]はじめたのだ……

definitions: 憎しみ[にくしみ] (n) hatred
english: All the anger and hatred I bore him, made it impossible for me to ever forget him. That and what he gave me.
japanese: セフィロスへの怒りと[憎しみ]。それは俺がセフィロスのこと、忘れないようにとセフィロスがくれたおくりもの……

definitions: 栗[くり] (n) Japanese chestnut (Castanea crenata)
庫裏[くり] (n) temple kitchen, monastery kitchen,quarters of a head priest (and his family)
刳り[くり] (n) hollow, scoop
クリ (n) clitoris
english: All the anger and hatred I bore him, made it impossible for me to ever forget him. That and what he gave me.
japanese: セフィロスへの怒りと憎しみ。それは俺がセフィロスのこと、忘れないようにとセフィロスがくれたお[くり]もの……

definitions: 本当[ほんとう] (adj-no, adj-na, adv) truth, reality, actuality, fact,proper, right, correct, official,genuine, authentic, natural, veritable
本島[ほんとう] (n) main island,this island
本盗[ほんとう] (n) stealing home
翻倒[ほんとう] (n, vs) turning upside-down
奔騰[ほんとう] (n, vs) soar (e.g. in price), jump, boom, sudden ride
本統[ほんとう] (n) main branch of a family,truth, reality
english: …it's really been a long time.
japanese: ……[ほんとう]に久しぶりね

definitions: 切っ掛け[きっかけ] (n) chance, start, cue, excuse, motive, impetus, occasion
english: You joined SOLDIER but quit after the Sephiroth incident, and now you're a mercenary…
japanese: 希望どおりにソルジャーになったことセフィロスの事件を[きっかけ]にやめてしまったこと、何でも屋をやっていること……
